title: Trying to figure out why I am "Permanently Banned"
body: No idea whats going on, have never been banned before, I just stream some bot games while cooking my ARK mods... obviously no hacks or cheating.  I havent used any racial slurs, and I try not to even get toxic in game!

replies.body: As Tract said, the best way to get details on why an account was banned or to try and recovery any account is to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Hit us up there and we can give all the context, as I wouldn't want to give out any of your personal info here on the boards.
Did you get an email? Generally Riot sends emails regarding their specific circumstances to those who receive a permaban. If not, the best course of action is to send a support ticket.
Nope, no email or anything :/  Thats why i'm super confused
I literally just got a key for keeping it sportsmanlike also lol

Wait, so is it a ban for behavior? You should probably just have said so if that's the situation. If Is somthing  like a chargeback or them defensively locking the account because they suspect it may have been hacked, support can help you. Either way, your best way to send a ticket and support will tell you.
